resources.string:
"Stockfish Chess" is an Android port of the famous "Stockfish" chess engine. 

You need a graphical user interface for playing against this engine. 

Please download the application "Chess for All" from the "Google Play Store" or press the "GUI" button.

"Stockfish" is developed by Tord Romstad, Marco Costalba and Joona Kiiski 

Translations: 
French - Ã‰ric Gallula 
Spanish - Sergio Revinelli, Sergio Ballesteros 
Russian - Ark (hark, arkpc) 

Graphics design by Lars Streblow 

"Stockfish Chess" is developed by Karl Schreiner 
(License: GNU GPLv3)
